Package cz.ive.genius

Provides interfaces and implementation of geniuses and classes for mannaging them and their behaviour.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AreaGenius Area genius provides services for geniuses who doesn't want to operate with their actors through accepting deleagation of processes.
Genius General genius interface.
PDecider Process decider, chooses among variants of fulfilling goals.
 

Class Summary
AreaGeniusImpl Basic implementation of the area genius.
BasicGenius Basic implementation of a genius.
BasicPDecider Simple PDecider implementation.
GeniusList List of all active geniuses.
GoalTreeNode Holds all the information needed to work with a goal.
PhantomKeeper This class offers methods for keeping phantoms updated.
QueueGenius Area genius specialized for queueing the actors.
 

Package cz.ive.genius Description

Provides interfaces and implementation of geniuses and classes for mannaging them and their behaviour. General simple genius and some specific like area genius are avaible. Also contains assistant classes for goals managing like PDecider.
